newsitem.title: CANADA: Canada April new motor vehicle sales fall 4.9 pct.
newsitem.headline: Canada April new motor vehicle sales fall 4.9 pct.

text.p: New motor vehicle sales fell 4.9 percent seasonally adjusted in April to 112,723 units from from a revised 118,582 (121,715) units in March, Statistics Canada said on Tuesday.
A Reuters survey of economists had forecast an average 5.8 percent fall in March vehicle sales.
